title: Dubai's Most Opulent Beachfront Oasis
description: Experience another level of luxury at the sumptuous Arabian Court at One&Only Royal Mirage, located next to Dubai's iconic Palm Jumeirah island. Spend three nights at the Arabian Court, in a grandiose Arabian Court Deluxe Room and enjoy daily breakfasts, lavish nightly dinners, daily access to Aquaventure Waterpark at Atlantis The Palm and a welcome drink per person served right on the beach, at the stylish One&Only Jetty Lounge.
offer_address: Jumeirah Beach, King Salman Bin Abdulaziz Al Saud Street, PO Box 37252, Dubai, UAE

title: Five-Star One&Only Opulence in Dubai
description: Experience beyond-five-star luxury at the opulent One&Only Royal Mirage, located next to Dubai's iconic Palm Island. Spend three nights in an Arabian Court Deluxe Room and enjoy daily breakfasts, nightly dinners, unlimited access to Aquaventure Waterpark and a welcome drink each for two adults. Plus one child stays, plays and eats free.
offer_address: Jumeirah Beach, King Salman Bin Abdulaziz Al Saud Street, PO Box 37252, Dubai, UAE
